trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Visar och uppdaterar medlemskap användarinformation som lagras i en Active Directory-databasen.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objektet används för att representera en enda medlemskap användare i Active Directory-medlemskap datalagret.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: Den visar information om användarens medlemskap, till exempel e-postadress och ger funktioner för användaren medlemskap, till exempel möjligheten att ändra eller återställa sitt lösenord.

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Ett ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objekt returneras av programmets medlemskapsprovider när programmet är konfigurerat för att använda en Active Directory-databasen.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: I ett program som kan konfigureras för att använda olika data lagras eller i ett program som använder flera datalager kan du referera till basklassen <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektet inte implementerar det <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>och <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>Egenskaper, måste du vara beredd på att hantera den <xref:System.NotSupportedException>som genereras när dessa medlemmar används i ett ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objekt.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-klassen implementerar interna optimeringar som används av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>klass för att minimera antalet attribut uppdateringar som uppstår när du anropar den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Den också Serialiserar den <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>representation (tillgänglig i den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>egenskapen) så att ett ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objekt kan serialisera och deserialisera utan undantag.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ett ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objekt som returneras av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>och <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metoder eller som en del av en <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>returnerades av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, och <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: Ett ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objekt krävs av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden när du vill uppdatera informationen för en befintlig användares gruppmedlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser egenskaper mappas till Active Directory-attribut.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: I följande tabell visas ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser egenskaper och deras attribut standardmappningar.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Directory standardattributet | Det går att mappa? | |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>| `securityIdentifier`| Inte | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>| `userPrincipalName`| Ja, men måste vara sAMAccountName eller userPrincipalName | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>| `comment`| Inte | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>| `whenCreated`| Inte | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>| `mail`| Ja, men måste vara ett enstaka attribut av typen Unicode-sträng. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a| Stöds inte av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a| Stöds inte av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>| `pwdLastSet`| Inte | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>| none, men måste mappas till ett attribut som använder frågor och svar säkerhet för lösenordsåterställning eller hämtning. | Ja, men måste vara ett enstaka attribut av typen Unicode-sträng. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>| `User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) | Inte | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>| beräknats från `lockoutTime` och AD-utelåsningstiden (AD i Windows 2000)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(AD i Windows Server 2003)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) | Inte | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>| Om utelåst på grund av för många felaktiga lösenordsförsök kontoutelåsning tid attributet returneras.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Om utelåst på grund av för många felaktiga lösenordssvar försök till det värde som lagras i attributet definieras av `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` returneras.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Senaste datum/tid-värdet returneras om utelåst på grund av ett felaktigt lösenord såväl för många felaktiga lösenord försök.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: Om kontot inte är utelåst returnerar 1/1/1753 för SQL-kompatibilitet. | Inte |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av en <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> objekt för en klass som ärver den <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-konstruktorn är inte avsedd att användas från din kod.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> klass med de angivna värdena.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en ny <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektet lägger inte till ett nytt medlemskap användarobjekt datalagret medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Lägg till en ny användare medlemskap i datalagret medlemskap, använda den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Observera att den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metoden returnerar ett <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objekt för medlemskap-användare som lagts till i datalagret.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objekt skapas ofta i programkoden för användning med den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden, men du kan också skicka ett <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektet som returneras från den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metod för att den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden samt.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objekt skapas också ofta genom medlemskap providern implementeringar för den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, och <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>postadress medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>värde för användaren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>värde för användaren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Den här parametern används inte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Den här parametern används inte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>användarens medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger programspecifik information för användaren medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Comment kan användas för att lagra anpassad information för medlemskap användare som är specifika för ett program.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Mängden information som kan lagras i den `Comment` -egenskapen för ett <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>definieras av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Comment är mappad till den `Comment` standardattributet för Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen kan inte ommappas till ett annat attribut.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Programspecifik information för Active Directory-medlem som lagras i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""> </xref> directory-attribut.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den e-postadressen för användaren medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: E-egenskap är mappad till den `Mail` directory-attribut.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen kan ommappas i Web.config-filen genom att ange den `attributeMapUserName` attribut i den [providers Element för profilen (inställningsschema för ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element för profiler.

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: E-postadressen för användaren medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om medlemskap användaren kan autentiseras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>Värdet för en användare medlemskap kontrolleras under anrop till <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: Om egenskapen IsApproved returnerar `false`, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>metoden returnerar `false` även om det angivna användarnamnet och lösenordet är rätt.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: IsApproved-egenskap är mappad till en av följande Active Directory-attribut.

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| | Active Directory | `User-Account-Control`| | Active Directory Application Mode | `msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| Den här egenskapen kan inte ommappas till ett annat attribut.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om användaren kan autentiseras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: Utlöser ett <xref:System.NotSupportedException>undantag i samtliga fall</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastActivityDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LastActivityDate stöds inte av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>klassen.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Försök att hämta eller ange värdet utlösa alltid <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar användar-ID från Active Directory-datalagret för användaren medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ProviderUserKey visar identifierare från medlemskap i allmänt skrev datakälla som en `object`.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ProviderUserKey kan omvandlas som en <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Användar-ID från Active Directory-data lagra användarens medlemskap.
